title: Into the Night with Jason Rohrer and Chris Crawford (Au Coeur de
description:
Episode of "Au Coeurs de la Nuit/Durch die Nacht mit../Into the Night" as it aired on TV, featuring the meeting of independent game minds Jason Rohrer and Chris Crawford. The hour-long tv show documents their meeting at this year's GDC. Topics talked about include views on game design, responsibilities, improving the medium etc.

This was ripped from the high quality WMV stream from Arte's Plus 7 homepage. Please don't hate on me if you regard using WMV as "selling out". Also, please forgive my shitty upload speed. And remember to seed this.

Another version of this episode (DVB-T recording, converted to x.264+AAC MP4) can be found here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4985472




Also: Thanks for choosing Pixeljunk Eden as the prime example of Indie Game Extravaganza out of all the IGF games available. Sigh.
